website_summaries.verdict: A top-selling eyebrow gel by Maybelline that offers decent wear, natural color, and notable definition. Even if your brows are light in color, chances are this product will work for you.
pros: Has a contoured brush that grooms and shapes brows, and defines arches
Adds natural color to sparse areas and works well for very pale and gray brows
Blonde shade works well for most blondes
A little goes a long way
cons: Will leave small clumps if you apply it too thickly, but they can be combed out with a spoolie brush
Product tends to dry up somewhat quickly, but closing the lid tightly will help keep it fresh

customer_reviews.title: If your eyebrows are gray - you'll give your hair color secret away
customer_reviews.text: This is my secret weapon for a more youthful look. I am a redhead who is graying so I color my hair now. But what about my eyebrows - I now have some white hairs growing in. I use this product every morning as part of my makeup routine. No one knows I have white hairs in my eyebrows now! I think it looks more natural when your eyebrows are similar in color to your hair, gray or white eyebrows are a dead giveaway that you are coloring your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ann G. Rosas

customer_reviews.title: very pleased at first ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the bad reviews. Maybe it depends on the color of your brows and what color you purchase. I'm really happy with the product and it's a lot cheaper then what I was paying before, for a much smaller tube. update - I get what people are talking about .. Clumps some hairs together and leaves black marks on your face when it spears off.. very odd.
customer_reviews.author: Cogs

customer_reviews.title: WOW!! I CAN SEE MY EYEBROWS AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: I'm in my sixties and my eyebrows have gotten too thin and kind of gray so I now have to use something to make them stand out a little. I've tried lots of pencils and they work okay but wanted to try something different. I love this product and it really makes every hair visible. What I don't like about it is it's just a little too dark for my fair complexion and blonde hair. If Maybelline comes out with a lighter shade, I'll snap it up!
customer_reviews.author: Judy H.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, for the most part.
customer_reviews.text: I read about this in a magazine article and decided it was a must have! It's so bloody hard finding anything that looks good blonde/gray hair. Everything is either too warm or too dark of a color. This one was just right. (Said Goldilocks, lol!) As others have said, there is a learning curve involved in order to apply this to just to your eyebrow hairs and not your skin. I'm not sure if it would be easier to use with a different applicator, or not. PROS: The blond color is actually great for blonds! Very long lasting. No problems with my sensitive eyes. Keeps wild eyebrows in place. CONS: A bit of a challenge to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Valleri

customer_reviews.title: I don't like filling in my brows too much for a daytime ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like filling in my brows too much for a daytime look so this is perfect for when I am rushing and don't want to carry a brow wax pencil, a pomade or a powder, and an eyeliner brush for my brows on the train on my way to work. Very easy to apply and doesn't make my brows look too dark, it keeps them in place and I apply more pressure to areas that I want filled a bit more. The best dupe for the Glossier boy brow, better price too!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: I only bought this because it was cheaper than nyx and I figured it couldn't be that bad, I was so wrong
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awful! This left dark patches on the skin around my eyebrows. I've used a lot of brow products and at least five different brow mascaras. I only bought this because it was cheaper than nyx and I figured it couldn't be that bad, I was so wrong. They ball applicator is also too big to do the whole brow so I had to use qtips to clean it up. Please do not buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy the Fiber Volumizer and bought this instead by mistake. I opened it figuring it couldn't be that different. It is! I wanted to lighten my brows like I do with the volumizer and this shade of soft brown is far darker. The applicator is a tiny ROUND brush that is not useful for following the natural brow. I have brows so I just wanted the color. This doesn't do it. It does nothing but leave a clumpy mess. Just ordered the Fiber Volumizer and this will be going in the trash since I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska_girl

customer_reviews.title: Good, but only three stars
customer_reviews.text: Great brow makeup, why not it's Maybeline! Not cakey until it gets old and time to open a new one and has good coverage. I took off two stars after Maybeline decided to use Transvestites in ads. That just struck me as stupid.
customer_reviews.author: Pelicanbrief

customer_reviews.title: One of my fav beauty products
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, it fills in brows quickly and evenly and keeps brows in place. It’s cheap, lasts well, and fills in brows without looking like they are drawn on. Originally bought it while waiting to get my shipment of Kat Von D brow filler from Sephora, I ended up liking this stuff better and it’s a fraction of the price. I can’t think of any negatives other than maybe needing a few more color options.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a must have!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brow product. The very easy-to-use wand lets you apply the color as light or heavy as you like. You basically just comb your brows and the color sticks to your hairs. If you have more sparse areas, the wand will add hair-like strokes for a very natural looking brow. I have very sensitive skin and this product doesn't bother my skin at all. Highly recommend and will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Dandj

customer_reviews.title: Product was dried out
customer_reviews.text: As far as I could tell, the product had dried out or something..... basically there was no product on the brush. I tried to apply it several times but it only left a few very faint marks. I got online and requested a refund and Amazon promptly complied with my request and their message said that I did not need to return the merchandise. Disappointed with the product but satisfied with Amazon's customer service.
customer_reviews.author: T. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Buildable bold brows for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and stays on all day. I used pencil and powder before trying gel and I’m never turning back! This stuff is reasonably priced for the size you get. It lasts me a good 2-3 months and I usually applying everyday. Also, the dark brown is a perfect match to my hair color and the product is buildable for a more bold brow. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KMAbs0212

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I find this product to be quite useful! Obviously, I still use eyebrow pencils to outline and define my brows first. But this product allows me to "fill in" and make my eyebrows look more voluminous without making them look too unnatural. You can smudge it with your fingertips or a piece of napkin. I ordered one shade lighter than my brows and it worked out perfectly. Make sure you apply thinly - if you want it to look darker, apply a second layer after the first layer dries - otherwise, it may feel very wet and funny.
customer_reviews.author: OysterBlue

customer_reviews.title: Keeps them in place while coloring them!
customer_reviews.text: I have medium to dark brown hair (dyed, of course, otherwise I wouldn't need to color my eyebrows). At first, I bought the lighter brown color, and it was so light that it barely made a difference. So I got this one instead and it works great. Unlike other eyebrow color mascara-type things, this one not only colors the hair, but it holds it in place, too. The only problem is you have to go over it several times for it to catch all of the hairs. Not a big deal, but worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: GoodBooks55

customer_reviews.title: Chunky glue.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst eyebrow mascara ever. I'm fairly certain it's just Elmer's glue in a tube. Ruined my makeup several days in a row until I finally decided to throw it away. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good tint, slight hold, doesn’t cover grays
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t noticeably tint or tame my wild thick white brow hairs, but it’s not obvious and it does bring the other hairs in line and it tints the “peach fuzz” hairs around the edges of my thin brows nicely and doesn’t look fake at all. I like other products better, but for the price point I am pleased with this product and the applicator works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: RecoverInBeautyTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: ... work well but I find the gel doesn't adhere easily to brow hairs
customer_reviews.text: Product has a ball-shaped applicator that should work well but I find the gel doesn't adhere easily to brow hairs. If some color sticks, it sticks in clumps and I use my regular eyebrow brush to smooth the clumping. Other similar products offered at amazon.com apply better and easier than this product. UPDATE: After using this product a few more times, I finally just threw it away; the gel became clumpier and didn't stick to the hairs any more. Off to find another product. I want to downgrade the star rating to one star or less.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real black color.  Decent coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Okay.. it takes three passes to cover the fray in my eyebrows, which are quite a few so I guess that’s alright, but I don’t like the brush. It tends to clump the gel on my eyebrows. A straight or curved wand without the bulky part would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Hair Maven

customer_reviews.title: I could try yet another shade darker but I think rather than waste the money I am going to try to find ...
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have tried many products (like mascara) to cover the gray in my eye brows. I have even used hair and moustache dye which the instructions specifically say NOT to do.. This worked well for many years although I find the mascaras too dark and unnatural looking. I was thrilled to find this eye brow product and have tried 2 different colors. It covers some of the gray but it simply does not cover the dye resistant gray thus the 3 stars.I could try yet another shade darker but I think rather than waste the money I am going to try to find a less dark brown mascara. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Voigt

customer_reviews.title: The Eyebrow Manager
customer_reviews.text: I find it works fine on one of my crazy and whiskery eyebrows. The other is white and does not cover easily. I can still use this product by dabbing the color onto my skin beneath the white hairs with the applicator tip before using according to directions. I have used for years Maybelline mascara in the pink and green tube (brown/black) for a fairly natural covering on my white brow. I like the special brush that comes with this product so I plan to experiment with combining both products.
customer_reviews.author: Bargainhunter

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: If you apply more than one coat it starts to clump and when dry it easily chips or rubs off
customer_reviews.author: J.A.Customer...

customer_reviews.title: ... adequate job for the price of $7 I don't like how once the product dries
customer_reviews.text: Does an adequate job for the price of $7 I don't like how once the product dries, it someone's looks like there's dirt on your eye brows. It doesn't happen all the time. But enough times for me to notice. I use the Trish McEvoy eyebrow mascara from Nordstrom hitch is about $36. And it does work consistently better than this Maybelline one. But for $7, I feel like I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: SuperShopper202

customer_reviews.title: One of the only brands to carry an auburn color!
customer_reviews.text: One tube doesn't last very long... I haven't found any other brands that make an auburn shade. Will buy this again and again. Love that it looks natural!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi M.

customer_reviews.title: she loves how nice her brows look
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 Maybelline brow drama, one for me and my daughter. The day I received them, I gave one my daughter one, she said she will use it once in awhile. She uses it everyday, she loves how nice her brows look. I love it too in that my hairs on my brows are turning white and the brow drama covers it so well. I always used a brow pencil and was not happy because you can see the pencil mark on my brows. This is a great brow happy I purchased the Maybelline New York Eyestudio Brow Drama.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Dipped the wand in and tried to use it, couldn't see any color whatsoever. Does not perform as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: E. Brunk

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product, I do. The color is perfect, I like the wand, and the price is decent. Just make sure you don't have a glob on the end of the ball when you apply, or you'll have thick lines instead of the natural looking brows is girls are going for.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Clear

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and formula!
customer_reviews.text: Great tinted brow gel to add definition and shape to eyebrows! Awesome, affordable dupe of Glossier’s Boy Brow. I’m a dyed redhead and have trouble finding reddish brow products that actually look natural. Definitely recommend using this with Maybelline’s Brow Precise Micro pencil to get fuller, more defined brows. Either sweep it through once to add a little product, or first backcomb through hairs to thoroughly coat then smooth back down. Keeps brows in place without being overly stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Drew

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that I probably should've ordered a slightly darker color. All my eyebrow pencils are blonde, so I figured blonde would be the appropriate choice (I have red-mixed hair with soft brown brows). Honestly, I can only see a little difference, but in combination with the pencils and filler powder, this product is perfectly fine. The applicator brush is a little odd, though. I ignore the wider part of the brush and do most or my grooming with the thinner parts - it results in a fuller appearance, I think - better for "building up" the brow.
customer_reviews.author: arreis325

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for thin or sparse brows
customer_reviews.text: I have very thin and sparse eyebrow hairs, so I'm always on the hunt for something to "fill them in" and make them look manicured. This product unfortunately did not do the job. The product went on clumpy and I found myself having to do a lot of manipulation to make it look more natural and less clownish. I think this product is not the best for those with thin brows such as mine. A powder or pencil is probably more suitable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: let me say again how satisfied I am with it
customer_reviews.text: Yet again, I know I have already written a review on this product. But, let me say again how satisfied I am with it. With age, my brow are either thinning or turning white. This is the ideal product to correct all that. I thank the seller sincerely for delivering this to me ahead of schedule and fully intact.
customer_reviews.author: GAYLA SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Prettier Brows, Easier than a pencil
customer_reviews.text: Waaaay better than using the "sculptor" pencil (can't recall which brand). This goes on pretty quickly, never has to be sharpened, and actually enhances my greying brows. Wakes up my whole face!
customer_reviews.author: ElevenAndUp

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: I am 60 and need some filling in for my eyebrows. It's no mess and works great. I was using black and tried the brown and the brown looks so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for taming brows and giving them more depth
customer_reviews.text: These are great for taming eyebrows and giving them more depth. It's easy to use too much, so you have to be cautious to use the product sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: mom of two

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable
customer_reviews.text: I have white eyebrows. Without the brow gel my face disappears. The Maybelline brow gel is easy to use, definitely not too dark, you apply more. Stays put during humid weather. Basic even for individuals like myself that wear minimum makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Anne D. Terry

customer_reviews.title: I do like the color
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't as impressed with this as I thought I would. I do like the color, but it seems like this would be better for girls needing to enhance their eyebrows if they were missing them. I have thick eyebrows, but only in the center, so I was hoping to round them out on the ends, instead it clumps up and makes the center look more thicker, which is not what I need. I have to constantly mess with it to make it straight. If I'm not quick enough, it drys and it's hard to fix. I kept trying to use it the first few weeks, then gave up. I won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like not enough liquid to me. Hard to apply because of the big round "ball" brush tip. Annoyed I wasted money but I had to try this because I have very light blonde eyebrows. I tried this twice on different days to give it a second chance. Forget it! There's no way to apply it so that it goes on easily and evenly, either.
customer_reviews.author: Kudos2Writers

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product before several times and I have loved it. This time, the product is clumpy. Maybe old? I have added a little water and that hasn't helped. It is horrible. I may return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeaniemom

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I switched to using the brunette color and that was a better color match for me. I had heard you should go a shade lighter on brows, but my brows are a quite dark brown and the blonde color looked a little off. But the formulation and the wand are really perfect. I love this product! I can use it on its own, or over a brow powder (I like the NYX taupe palette.)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kaczmarek

customer_reviews.title: Great for eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: Great for eyebrows. I had another kind before that it was powder and as soon as I sweat a little the product would be al over my face. With this product I don’t have that problem.
customer_reviews.author: RomiNation

customer_reviews.title: a good product at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Maybelline Brow Drama Sculpting Eyebrow Mascara, Soft Brown, 0.23 fl. oz. is a good product at a very reasonable price. My wife will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: pjburnTop Contributor: Historical Fiction Books

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one
customer_reviews.text: The brush is horrible and makes it impossible to put on easily, it's far too big and just not a good shape at all. It glombs up and in no way looks natural - I tried 6 or 7 different times and it just doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: KathyB

customer_reviews.title: My eyebrows are blonde and this product dafines and shapes ...
customer_reviews.text: My eyebrows are blonde and this product dafines and shapes them without looking too dark. However, if you aren’t looking for this specific color, I’d try a different brand. The brush shaped is weird and too big so you have to be really careful when applying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The "wand" is not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I wish the wand didn't have the big bulb on the end. Makes it hard to get in the small places of your eyebrow. I wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ksilva

customer_reviews.title: Applicator sucks
customer_reviews.text: I HATE this applicator! I had the gel all over my lid and forehead... So frustrating, couldn't get a defined brow look at all. I only used it for about three days before throwing it out...
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: this is a favorite minimalist product of mine
customer_reviews.text: As someone who can avoid makeup if I have anything to do with it, this is a favorite minimalist product of mine. Super easy, fast, and inconspicuous. Never comes off on my face throughout the day, so it's nice I don't have to keep checking to see if it's still in place. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lindner

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I've been using it for about a year, and just started ordering it from Amazon to save me a trip to the drugstore. This is the only product I use on my brows and I regularly get compliments on how they look. I have really thick hair, and sometimes I get a few stubborn hairs that just won't work with me that I'm afraid to tweeze. This product sticks them in place and with one application they don't move all day!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Sowles

customer_reviews.title: this is the BEST brow product i've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: this is the BEST brow product i've ever bought. Easy to apply, doesn't smudge and lasts all day while looking natural. Even holds up after a long workout. Great value, beats a lot of the more expensive products and the round brush works really well. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shilpdawg

customer_reviews.title: For organized  beautiful brows
customer_reviews.text: wonderful ! arrived quickly . Like it a lot ! Gives my eyebrows extra color and keeps them in place . Really good product , like all the Maybelline products that I have tried . Ordered dark brown . will order again . Saw it on a few youtubers, Lana and Fleur de Force . Good buy .
customer_reviews.author: Monica Meza

customer_reviews.title: Dried up, unusable
customer_reviews.text: I believe this product has been discontinued awhile ago, and this one was completely dried up and unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri D.

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I need
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, does not smudge, easy to take off with makeup wipes. Pretty much what you expect out of the product.
customer_reviews.author: mommaof2

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I was able to find this at a decent price! It is my absolute FAV eyebrow product and I was devastated that Maybelline discontinued it! It is perfect for filling in brows without them looking overly done! I always get compliments on my brows b/c of this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Applicator brush does not work well
customer_reviews.text: The little bulb on the end of the application brush makes it very difficult to apply this product. I'm perplexed as to why it is designed this way, as a mascara type brush works much better. The fact that it has this wonky brush makes it very hard to evaluate the product. It is actually worth it to spend $22 and get the good stuff (Anastasia Beverly Hills, I like the auburn color, which stays on all day) either here on Amazon or at Ulta, which is what I did after buying this maybelline product.
customer_reviews.author: WestieloverTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few different brands and found I really like the brush applicator on this the best. Nice color as well. (And I love the fast Amazon prime shipping)
customer_reviews.author: GrammyGG

customer_reviews.title: Please never discontinue my favorite product, Maybelline!
customer_reviews.text: My eyebrows are about five shades lighter than my natural hair, so I need something to darken them without looking weird. This is my favorite eyebrow product I have ever used! It's cheap, easy and quick and requires very little finesse to still look natural. It has been discontinued in every store in town, so I'm so happy Amazon still has it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I really LOVE the Brow Drama for my brows
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVE the Brow Drama for my brows, I will keep using it until Maybelline stops making it. I will keep it in my make up pouch everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Martin

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not great for hold. Good separation but if you touch your face at all its ruined .
customer_reviews.author: Deep

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for a long time and absolutely luv it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. If your brows are sparse-on the thinner end... don't waste your money. It works best on medium brows for medium staying power. Works ok but not what I'm looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E.

customer_reviews.title: Use everyday. Please don’t discontinue this Maybelline
customer_reviews.text: My go to must for my eyebrows. I use everyday. Blonde is perfect color for those going for a natural brow look. Not too dark or painted on looking. Adds fullness and I shape up with a wet qtip.
customer_reviews.author: Kdoodle

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just needed a little extra tint to my brows and this does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: eyesclosed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Does not look you are even wearing brow makeup. Very natural. Perfect color
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M. Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Nice color!
customer_reviews.text: I have auburn hair, and I like the way that this product softens my naturally black eyebrows to more of a blended color. The applicator is kind of interesting in that it works like a mascara wand, but could also be more precise in applying the product to the ends of my eyebrows. Overall I think it works better than an eyebrow pencil, and it wears well for the whole day. I'm happy with the results!
customer_reviews.author: D. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Best brow filler I've found
customer_reviews.text: Better than any other brow filing product I've used. As you fill in your broad with the brush, you get a very natural full look. . I did have to fill in some spots with a darker color pencil but my brows look natural. Full, and stay in place all day. . I have it set up to be delivered every 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Malinda SynnamonTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I  will keep buying this product.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use and covered up the gray that's starting to grow in my eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: For bold brows...
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. If you're wanting "Instagram brows" these are definitely a handy tool in your arsenal. I'd recommend using a pencil to fill in your brows first, and then use this to give them texture and to flesh them out a bit. This is a great product. I've used it most days for a few months now.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: unnecessary brush shape.
customer_reviews.text: the biggest thing I didn't like was the brush. I honestly couldn't figure out how best to use it to apply the product. a simple short & small spoolie design would have been efficient. The formula itself seems okay but I can't seem to make myself use the brush to even get a good idea of the formula.
customer_reviews.author: Emmalee Russo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Used to help my eyebrows actually show without looking “drawn on”.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and have been using it for a while. The only down side is that it tends to stack up on the eyebrows do you need to apply carefully and don't let it get piled up in one area. Once dry, it makes the eyebrows stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken Lady

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product- it is subtle and gives my brows ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product- it is subtle and gives my brows definition without being overly groomed. I have thick, heavy eyebrows and they need a little taming, but I don't like pencils. The shade is an exact match.
customer_reviews.author: Clare C

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed this when I used it
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this when I used it. I switched to a pomade (milan for $6 at any drug store) so it would last longer though.
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Looks more Natural than with pencils
customer_reviews.text: Works Good, I tend to have to dip the end more often than normal lash mascara, but does look more natural than pencils. Tends to start to make my brows itch by the end of the day though.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Disppointed with Maybelline.
customer_reviews.text: Maybelline missed with this one. I normally use Mommy makeup brow tint but I thought I'd try a well known brand like Maybelline. At first I thought the container was empty. I pulled the brush out and nothing on it. I then got some color and attempted to tint my brows and it would not color my brows. Over all I'll pay the higher price and stay with Mommy makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Val R

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: I use this product all the time and love it, but this seller sent a product that was clumpy and un-useable
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: If you want a good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This does nothing for the brows, if you're looking for a product that gives you no extra coverage, smears everywhere, and doesn't fill in any sparse areas on your brows; then this is the product for you. If you want a good quality product, I suggest you walk away and look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: This is the exact color I’ve been looking for my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact color I’ve been looking for my mascara. The only problem is it’s not really mascara texture. After I curl my lashes I put on the mascara and it quickly goes flat.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Brown
customer_reviews.text: I needed this because I've been using just black eye shadow to fill in my eyebrows. Here's the problem with that- The powder isn't easy to apply to my brows, the black is too dark because my natural brow color is more chestnut and dark brown, and brows need to be a little bit lighter than your natural hair color in order to enhance them (especially with blue eyes). This brown was a perfect color for me. It was exactly what I was looking for in terms of a chestnut brown color. It grooms my brows without making them look painted. This is my first brow gel that I've bought and used, and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. I have always used powder only on my eyebrows and was trying to "up my game" a little. It is fast and easy to apply, gives you a nice tint and the gel like texture gives you a more polished look. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: scasey

customer_reviews.title: This product gives me enough color to it looks like I do have eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: I do not go for the dramatic dark brow. This product gives me enough color to it looks like I do have eyebrows, albeit, not very big eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this but I think it was just ok. It was kind of hard to put on. Felt like not much came off the brush onto my eyebrows,
customer_reviews.author: Sweetpea

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a tinted wax and was looking for the same thing when I found this brow mascara and decided to try it. It's very easy for me to apply. Since I have very low vision (legally blind) that's important! I have white/gray hair (former blond), so the blond color works well. As someone else said, this makes your brows a bit crispy, like hairspray.
customer_reviews.author: JennyWren

customer_reviews.title: I can get it to work for me but it is a waste of product to wipe it on tissue until it ...
customer_reviews.text: This product does clump despite what the reviews say or product details. You have to wipe it on tissue several times so that it doesn't clump. I can get it to work for me but it is a waste of product to wipe it on tissue until it is practically gone in order to use it.
customer_reviews.author: techgurl1988

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Hold Brow Hair in Place
customer_reviews.text: Since I'm medium blonde, this product is a little darker than I'd like, but it's not too dark. What it doesn't do is hold the brow hair in place and I'm keenly disappointed in that aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: When it came in, I tried it on and ...
customer_reviews.text: When it came in, I tried it on and it seemed lighter than what I thought it would be because I have dark eyebrows. I tried it on my younger sister since her eyebrows are light and you could barely tell the difference. I usually apply 3-4 coats to be able to notice it.
customer_reviews.author: Maritza

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know how old this product was, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how old this product was, but it is bone dry. Absolutely nothing in it. Not even worth the effort to return it
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok
customer_reviews.text: I was being cheap and decided to try this instead of my usual department store product. There's no comparison. The brush is an odd shape and hard to use and I feel like I have to use twice as much product to get the same result.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money!
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product because I feel the tip of the applicator is too large, therefore the product does not spread evenly throughout my eyebrows. I would rather the applicator be slender all the way to the tip. This product is also too expensive and I would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyday

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many brow mascaras but, unlike the others, this one works even if you've over plucked. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, when it’s a fresh one.
customer_reviews.text: I like this but have found the product to be inconsistent in quality; this latest one I received was gloppy from the start.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Finally an easy way to do Eyebrows!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little doubtful when buying this product and since I am a blonde and my eyebrows are very light - I thought well I will give it a try. GREAT RESULTS! And it is very easy to use - much better than eyebrow pencils that take up so much of your time! I will buy it again. I am very pleased!! Thank you Maybelline!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Ciganovich

customer_reviews.title: Just OK. Not a substitute for brow leader Glossier
customer_reviews.text: Just OK. I love glossier but not the price tag. This product is nit a substitute for the ease of use and excellent hold of glossier.
customer_reviews.author: Catinva

customer_reviews.title: Great to fill in lost color
customer_reviews.text: If you have eyebrows that are getting grey, use this to fill in the lost color. It is so simple to use. Just swipe it across your brow and not only does it give a little color, it sets stray hairs in place. Just give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Pop Oblivion

customer_reviews.title: Product dried up and nearly empty.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product 5 stars, because I think it could be great. However, my product came dried up and nearly empty. This is very frustrating, because I can barely get enough product on the brush to make a difference. But the brush and the concept are a good idea, and hopefully I will get to try this product again with a full tube.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and applies smoothly.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I have limited skill in makeup application but this is so easy to apply and enhances my brow colour without looking clumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing. It does the job and lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It does the job and lasts all day. No need to put color on your brows, it covers the gray.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: I use this as mascara. All traditional mascaras I've ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this as mascara. All traditional mascaras I've tried seem to dark for me as I have naturally blond hair and light eye lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Grant Glaze

customer_reviews.title: nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so bad at anything to do with makeup. This is fool proof. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: megan coleman

customer_reviews.title: Could be better sad it's discontinued
customer_reviews.text: Funny this is my favorite brow color cosmetic but I use an angled brush to apply it in strikes it comes out better and the product gets thick/old too quuckly
customer_reviews.author: michelle edwards

customer_reviews.title: Turned Grey Eyebrows into Brows you can Actually See
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite make-up item. I now have grey hair and this solved the problem of looking like I didn't have eyebrows. I don't wear alot of make-up but this with a little mascara and some lipstick provides a great daytime look. Looks natural
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use this every day and it gives a nice natural brow look
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day and it gives a nice natural brow look. It is really helpful because I usually get foundation on my eyebrows and it fades them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This is clumpy and thick. I didn't like the brush/wand or product consistency. There are better options than this on the market. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: m4star

product_meta.title: Maybelline Brow Drama Sculpting Eyebrow Mascara, Soft Brown, 0.23 fl. oz.
product_meta.description: Color:Soft BrownThis eyebrow gel mascara tames and fills unruly brows for sculpted, full eyebrows. Packaging may vary, what you receive may not be what is reflected on site. • Sculpt and tint eyebrows in one easy step • Up to 12 hour gel mousse with a comfortable, even finish • New curved brush mimics brow shape for precise application • Tip - for a more dramatic look, use a darker tint Use curved sculpting brush to apply onto eyebrows in light upward strokes. Follow along brow contour. To safeguard purity, reserve this product for your personal use. Treat the applicator with the hygienic care you give your eyes. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle. Do don’t dilute with water, saliva, or any other substance. Cap tightly after use. If a change in odor or appearance occurs, discontinue use. Do not use this or any other cosmetic if your eye is injured, irritated, or infected. Consult a physician promptly.
feature_bullets: Sculpt and tint eyebrows in one easy step
Up to 12 hour gel mousse with a comfortable, even finish
New curved brush mimics brow shape for precise application
Tip - for a more dramatic look, use a darker tint

specifications.Manufacturer: Maybelline, Consumer Products Division of L’Oréal USA S/D, Inc.
